exceptions.exn: In environment convex_1 : forall x p : nat, 2 * (x * (x + p)) <= x * x + (x + p) * (x + p) convex_2 : forall x p : nat, 2 * (x * (x + p)) = x * x + (x + p) * (x + p) -> p = 0 convex_3 : forall a t x y : nat, 0 < t -> a * x + (a + t) * y = a * y + (a + t) * x -> x = y n : nat f, g : nat -> nat IHn : ∑ n (fun i : nat => 2 * (f i * g i)) <= ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * f i + g i * g i) Unable to unify "∑ n (fun i : nat => 2 * (f i * g i)) <= ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * f i + g i * g i)" with "∑ n (fun n : nat => f (S n) * g (S n) + (f (S n) * g (S n) + 0)) <= ∑ n (fun n : nat => f (S n) * f (S n) + g (S n) * g (S n))".

original: intros. induction n. - simpl. auto. - simpl. apply Nat.add_le_mono. + apply convex_le. + apply IHn.
